name: United States

typical_paths.label: US advisory perimeter (informational)
bullets: US rules depend on adviser registration status, exemptions, and the investor base.
Treat as partial: GNCO must surface regulatory status and require counsel review.

marketing_notes: US marketing / solicitation rules are complex; avoid any performance claims in materials.
Always verify exemptions and offering structures with US counsel.
requires_counsel_triggers: Any reliance on exemptions (e.g., Regulation D) without counsel.
Any private fund adviser rule status questions (must be date-stamped).
